description:
Invisible Zinc Sheer Defence Tinted Moisturiser SPF 50 Light is a lightweight mineral shield with a sensitive skin formulation Broad spectrum UVAUVB protection and 2hr waterresistant

Invisible Zinc Sheer Defence Tinted Moisturiser SPF 50 Light is a lightweight moisturiser and high protection mineral sunscreen with a sheer tint With only one active ingredient Zinc Oxide acts as a barrier against the sun reflecting UV radiation away Use daily to nourish protect and help prevent the appearance of premature ageing of the skin caused by UV exposure

Sensitive skin formula
Frangrance free
Paraben free
Dermatologist tested
Noncomedogenic

No Chemical UV Filters

Reef Friendly
name: Invisible Zinc Sheer Defence Spf 50 Tinted Moisturiser Sunscreen Light 50g
